page.title: 05STANDARD SOAP
page.content: {STANDARD SOAP. {-------------- { Standard Soap was opened in 1928,but was not successful until 1968 when it was taken over by Croda Chemicals. Standard Soap make many brands of soaps and toiletries,they also make many types of private label soaps which they export and sell to companies and shops such as Marks & Spencer and Harrods, home and abroad! The factory employs over 500 people,working on 11 construction lines,on shifts of 8am to 4.45pm and 1pm to 10pm. For an average job at Standard Soap you need concentration and a fair amount of skill with your hands.
